long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LingoPear aims to combine good learning practices with cutting-edge AI technology to provide language learners with a tool that is effective, efficient, and easy to use. For now, you can:
- Learn any language with videos and subtitles from YouTube and Netflix.
- Navigate videos by subtitles instead of by timeline, so you can easily repeat the current sentence, and go to previous or next one.
- Chat with AI whenever you have questions while watching videos.
- Transcribe YouTube videos into word-by-word subtitles.
- Practice listening and pronunciation by focusing on a subtitle segment and repeating its audio.
- Collect flashcards with text and audio snippets for later review and practice.
- and more!
long.zh_CN:
灵果派旨在将优秀的学习方法与前沿的人工智能结合起来，为语言学习者提供一个有用、高效且友好的学习工具。目前，你可以：
- 利用 YouTube 和 Netflix 的视频及字幕学习任何语言。
- 按照字幕进行视频导航，比如重复当前句子、返回上一句、前往下一句。
- 在观看视频时遇到任何问题，可以随时与 AI 讨论答疑。
- 为 YouTube 视频一键生成逐词字幕。
- 截取并重复音频片段来练习听力和发音。
- 收集文本或音频问答卡，供日后复习与练习。
- 以及更多！
